summary: SummaryLancôme Absolue Revitalizing Eye Serum is an indulgent ant-aging eye serum for all skin types that smooths skin and visibly reduces under-eye wrinkles.
details: DetailsFeaturesMade with an exclusive blend of Grand Rose Extracts, Absolue Revitalizing Eye Serum targets the delicate skin around the eyes, one of the face's most expressive features.Immediately after using the eye serum, skin feels hydrated and velvety to the touch.After one-week, skin feels smoother and appears fresher and more rested.In four weeks, under eye winkles are visibly reduced and area below eyebrow appears smoother.Skin Type/Safety Measures: Tested for tolerance under dermatological control. Suitable for all skin types, including oily skin and sensitive skin.Texture: A luxurious yet lightweight serum that hydrates the skin without appearing shiny or feeling sticky.Key IngredientsFormulated without parabens, sulfates, and mineral oil.Grand Rose Extracts: Lancôme's proprietary blend of rose extracts sourced exclusively from the South of France. Advanced green technology is used to capture the revitalizing rose extract.Meadowfoam Seed Oil: Its emollient properties help maintain the skin in good condition by strengthening the skin's surface to prevent against water loss.Sodium Hyaluronate: A salt form of hyaluronic acid known for its ability to retain water, thereby helping to smooth and re-plump skin with moisture. Sodium hyaluronate is also more bioavailable than hyaluronic acid, meaning that it can be more readily absorbed into the skin.*Ingredient benefits are based on product formula testing, not on the individual ingredients.Research Results90% agree skin feels velvety to the touch88% agree skin feels hydrated79% agree eye area texture looks improved*Based on self-assessment results in a 4-week consumer study with 52 womenItem 2606377How To UseUse anti-aging serum twice daily, in the morning and at night on clean, dry skin alone or before Absolue Revitalizing Eye Cream.Step 1: Dispense one pump of the serum on the tip of your finger, using half the quantity for one eye and the other half for the second eye.Step 2: Using your fingertips with a tapping motion, apply small pearls of the serum to the skin on the eye contour.Step 3: Gently smooth the serum onto the skin until it is completely absorbed.For best skincare results, avoid pulling the skin and applying too close to the eyes.IngredientsAqua / Water, Propanediol, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Dimethicone, PEG-20, Acacia Senegal Gum, PEG/PPG/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Ci 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Mica, Hydroxypropyl Tetrahydropyrantriol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Hydrolyzed Linseed Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Adenosine, Caffeine, PPG-3 Myristyl Ether, Silica, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Geraniol, Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract / Jasmine Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, BHT, Citronellol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use anti-aging serum twice daily, in the morning and at night on clean, dry skin alone or before Absolue Revitalizing Eye Cream.Step 1: Dispense one pump of the serum on the tip of your finger, using half the quantity for one eye and the other half for the second eye.Step 2: Using your fingertips with a tapping motion, apply small pearls of the serum to the skin on the eye contour.Step 3: Gently smooth the serum onto the skin until it is completely absorbed.For best skincare results, avoid pulling the skin and applying too close to the eyes.
ingredients: Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil
Jasminum Officinale Flower Extract / Jasmine Flower Extract

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin. This product firmed the skin under my eyes without irritation.

media.headline: Worth every penny
media.caption: The absolute best Absolue serum ever

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this eye serum for about three weeks now. I do think the appearance of the fine lines around my eyes has smoothed out.
faceoff_positive.headline: Has softened my wrinkles

faceoff_negative.comments: This and the eye serum completely damaged the skin under my eyes. My skin got so irritated that I ended up getting dermatitis and now that part of my face looked worse than before. I have had a very high expectation on Lancome products; I have been using them for about more than10 years now. I still have 2 bottles of the eye serum and 1 container of the eye cream. But now, I am very wary of using both Lancome eye products and others. Lancome is still my go-to beauty products, just not for my eyes.
faceoff_negative.headline: Worse than before
